example.name: passive, with surface and message
example.text: [The front of the monument in the garden]-21 was inscribed [*-21] with the 12 large words " Martyrs who [*T*-22] died in the Southern Anhui Incident will be immortal forever " , written [*] personally by comrade Xiaoping Deng .
example.arg: with the 12 large words " Martyrs who [*T*-22] died in the Southern Anhui Incident will be immortal forever " , written [*] personally by comrade Xiaoping Deng
